ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // “Taking care of yourself is the
law of the slums. But to do that,
first you need weapons, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // “You never know what's going to happen
in this crazy world.”{PAUSE}“So you'd better have a weapon
you can depend on! Am I right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // “I don't know crap about crap!
But I do know one thing.”{PAUSE}“People are always gonna
need a good strong weapon!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // “Taking care of yourself is the
law of the slums. But to do that,
first you need weapons, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // “Huh? You want weapons?
That's too damn bad…”{PAUSE}“I ain't got no weapons to sell ya!
And the reason is…”{PAUSE}“…the weapon store's over that way.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // “…sure is loud outside.
Wonder what's happening.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // “Huh? You want weapons?
That's too damn bad…”{PAUSE}“I ain't got no weapons to sell ya!
And the reason is…”{PAUSE}“…the weapon store's over that way.”

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:7}); // “Meteor's getting closer.
You can hear it rumbling.”{PAUSE}“We don't do something about it
and pretty soon it'll be…ker-blam!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:6}); // “Toot toot!
Next stop…Midgar
Midgar.”{PAUSE}“Any passengers getting off at Midgar
should please ring.”{PAUSE}“You know, Midgar's supposed to be
sparkly 'n'
springy 'n'
sleeky.”{PAUSE}“Oh yeah.
Someday, I'm goin' there.”

dialogStrings:
“Taking care of yourself is the
law of the slums. But to do that,
first you need weapons, right?”

“You never know what's going to happen
in this crazy world.”{PAUSE}“So you'd better have a weapon
you can depend on! Am I right?”

“I don't know crap about crap!
But I do know one thing.”{PAUSE}“People are always gonna
need a good strong weapon!”

“Huh? You want weapons?
That's too damn bad…”{PAUSE}“I ain't got no weapons to sell ya!
And the reason is…”{PAUSE}“…the weapon store's over that way.”

“…sure is loud outside.
Wonder what's happening.”

“Toot toot!
Next stop…Midgar
Midgar.”{PAUSE}“Any passengers getting off at Midgar
should please ring.”{PAUSE}“You know, Midgar's supposed to be
sparkly 'n'
springy 'n'
sleeky.”{PAUSE}“Oh yeah.
Someday, I'm goin' there.”

“Meteor's getting closer.
You can hear it rumbling.”{PAUSE}“We don't do something about it
and pretty soon it'll be…ker-blam!”
